title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Vanki Pendant - Adda (వంకీ అడ్డ)
materials: Natural Emerald cabochon. Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Intricate filigree design reminiscent of a blooming lotus. Delicate floral motifs encrusted with shimmering diamonds. Center features a lush green Emerald cabochon set within a gold floral frame. Antique finish adds to its timeless appeal. Single gold dangled pendant adds a touch of playfulness.
occasions: or as a statement piece for festive occasions like Diwali or Ugadi. This piece adds elegance to modern sarees and lehengas as well.
description: Handcrafted by master artisans with generations of experience in traditional Telugu jewelry making. The exquisite filigree and diamond work showcases unparalleled craftsmanship. The Vanki Adda design is a timeless symbol of prosperity and good fortune. The natural Emerald represents harmony and new beginnings.
